common.results_disclaimer: * Results may vary. Consistency is key to success.

hero.title: Save Time... Eat Healthy Without Sacrificing Taste
hero.subtitle: Healthy, fresh, calorie-counted meals delivered to your door daily. Not hospital food—this is chef-crafted nutrition!

pain.title: Why MealPrep Pro?
pain.p1: No time to cook every day?
pain.solution: We solve it all with real chef meals that taste amazing and are perfectly balanced.

how.title: How to Start?
how.step1_desc: Set your goal (loss, gain, or health) and pick the right plan.
how.step2_desc: Select your favorite meals from our diverse weekly menu.
how.step3_desc: Your meals arrive fresh every morning, ready to eat.

faq.title: Have Questions?
faq.a1: We deliver daily between 7 AM and 9 AM to start your day right.
faq.a2: Yes! You can pause or delay your subscription anytime via the app with no extra fees.
faq.q3: How do you ensure food quality?
faq.a3: We use 100% fresh ingredients and cook daily without any preservatives.
faq.a4: Yes, every meal is weighed and its macros (P/C/F) are calculated precisely.

modal.title: Enter your details and we'll contact you
modal.name: Full Name
modal.success: Request received! We will contact you soon.
